text: Motion
Motion
Motion
Motion
Motion
Motion
Motion
Narration
Store Manager
Mimi
Saya
Yui
Riko

At the café "Moment" nestled in the corner of the city,
The rain has stopped, under the blue sky──

Today, with our regular customers invited,
It seems like some fun event is taking place──

What's going on~? We're serving shaved ice,
a new menu for the next season~...

Strawberry~, salted caramel~, and matcha!
Tell us your favorite flavor~!

Hmm...
I think I'll go with strawberry.

Yes, it's very delicious──
There's a delightful harmony in its unique texture...

The fluffy texture on top of the shaved ice...
What do you call it? It's so addicting...

It's called "espuma"...
It melts in your mouth...

Let's keep one flavor as regular~
The rest will be changed weekly.
Everyone's opinions are super important~!

Haha, the responsibility is huge...!
But, they're all so delicious, it's hard to choose...

It makes me happy to hear that~!
But, I hope you can decide intuitively!

And, this is also a tasting event
to thank everyone~!

Making sure everyone
enjoys the food is the most important~!

Oh, I see, it's for that reason...
But why this group of people?

Everyone loves sweets...
They come to try out new items right away~!

Even though everyone's taste preferences are different~...
Our customers give off the vibe of "Moment".

...Indeed, while the deliciousness is certainly attractive,
everyone probably comes seeking this warmth.

Even for shaved ice, warmth?
Manager, I'll have the salted caramel~

Hehe, first vote goes to salted caramel~!
Everyone, please don't hesitate to share your favorites~!
